gradientCard.title: V-LENS 1
gradientCard.desc: Enhance your athletic experience with the V-LENS 1. Ideal for cycling, running, or horse riding, it features advanced photochromic lenses that adjust to changing light, providing optimal visibility and UV protection.

preorder.title: V-LENS 1
preorder.desc: Powered by locally built generative AI models, V-LENS 1 revolutionizes the way you train and compete – at the speed of sight.
preorder.text: Want another style? Contact us for more information on special requests!
